title: Senior Frontend Developer - React
description:
**Xensam:** SAM DisruptersXensam is the leading provider of AI-powered, cloud-hosted Software Asset Management technology. We’re looking for key players to join us as we scale our impact and build the Xensam team together. We take our culture seriously and strive to maintain the excellence, energy & enthusiasm that flows through the organization today.
  
Join our dynamic team as we develop the next generation Software Asset Management platform. We are a forward-thinking company that values innovation, collaboration, and a passion for technology. Our team is committed to delivering high-quality software solutions that meet the evolving needs of our clients.
  
About the roleWe are seeking a Senior Frontend Developer with expertise in React and Node.js. The ideal candidate will also have some experience with PostgreSQL and a strong desire to write maintainable and efficient code. This role requires a self-sufficient, driven individual who takes pride in their work and is eager to help other team members when needed. A positive attitude and passion for coding are essential.
  
Responsibilities
  
**Develop and Implement:** Design and build user interface components using React.js and Node.js, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.
  
**Collaborate:** Work closely with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and database developers, to create seamless and engaging user experiences.
  
**Optimize:** Continuously improve application performance and scalability, utilizing best practices and modern technologies.
  
**Mentor:** Provide guidance and support to junior developers, fostering a collaborative and learning-focused environment.
  
**Maintain Code Quality:** Participate in code reviews, ensuring adherence to coding standards and best practices.
  
**Innovate:** Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, and proactively suggest improvements and new features.
  
  

Qualifications
  
5+ years of professional experience in frontend development with React and Node.js. Also experience with modern development tools and environments, such as Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud platforms.
  
Strong knowledge of JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and popular React.js workflows, preferably Mobx.
  
Familiarity with PostgreSQL and experience integrating it into applications.
  
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot and debug complex issues.
  
Ability to work effectively in a team environment, with a willingness to share knowledge and support others.
  
Familiarity with Agile methodologies and experience working in an Agile team
  
Strong verbal and written communication skills in fluent English and Swedish.
  
  

Some of the things that we expect from you in this role
  
You willreceive a specification from the designerand implement the code.
  
You will collaborate with other developers, doingcode reviews, ensuringthat best coding practices are followed.
  
  

What you get
  
Adynamic position embracing "freedom under responsibility".
  
Three days in-office (with remote work on Mondays and Fridays).
  
Free access to beverages, snacks, gym facilities, on-site massage, shuffleboard, and other games.
  
If sales targets are met, all employees enjoy an annual destination trip.
  
Join an ambitious and diverse team, andwork with cutting-edge technology in the fastest-growing SAM software on the market.
  
An opportunity to shape your career growth while contributing to the company’s success.
  
  

**At Xensam, our core values define our culture:**  

**Rebellious:** We encourage a spirit of freedom and initiative within responsibility.
  
**Humane:** We foster a caring, inclusive environment that values diversity and respects individuality.
  
**Harmonious:** We promote work-life balance, creating a pleasant, supportive workplace.
  
  

Join Xensam for a balanced, collaborative, and growth-focused work environment. If you're a team player ready to thrive, APPLY now!

title: Snälla och erfarna Javautvecklare
description:
Visionite är IT-konsultbolaget som alltid sätter individen i fokus. Vi har fått flera stora förfrågningar av flera kunder inom Javastacken och söker därmed flertalet javautvecklare för att kunna möta våra kunders behov.
  
Vi söker dig som är snäll och har jobbat minst tre år, gärna fler än så med javautveckling. Du kommer tillsammans med kundens medarbetare arbeta i ett agilt team med fler kollegor från Visionite. Kunduppdraget är långsiktigt men i rollen som konsult har du stor frihet att på sikt välja uppdrag hos någon av våra lokala, nationella och internationella kunder.
  
Vi tycker det är viktigt att man har goda förutsättningar att göra ett bra jobb och våra konsulter arbetar i huvudsak med en kund i långa uppdrag. Vidare tycker vi det är viktigt att man har roligt på jobbet och har därmed alltid något roligt i kalendern att se fram emot.
  
Våra ambitioner
  
Vår vision är att vara den bästa arbetsgivaren för IT-specialister. Alla våra medarbetare får ta del av Visionite-modellen och hos oss är individen alltid i fokus. Vi vet att vi blir som mest framgångsrika tillsammans om du mår bra på fritiden och på jobbet. Vi ger dig därför förutsättningarna för en mer flexibel vardag där du får friheten att välja hur mycket du vill jobba och om du vill arbeta hemifrån, hos kund eller in-house i våra fina lokaler.
  
  

**VI ERBJUDER:**  

Långsiktigt uppdrag där man arbetar i team
  
En trygg månadslön – Vi bestämmer tillsammans en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag
  
Tjänstebil – Vi ser gärna att du väljer en elbil
  
Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter att löneväxla
  
Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring
  
Afterworks, kollegiala forum och konferenser i tex. Kroatien, Portugal eller Spanien.
  
Kompetensutveckling – du sätter din egen budget och väljer själv vilka utbildningar du vill delta i
  
Kontorsplats på vårt huvudkontor i centrala Luleå
  
Stark säljorganisation som varje dag arbetar för inflöde av spännande konsultuppdrag.
  
  

**DIN KOMPETENS:**  

Flerårig erfarenhet av systemutveckling och gärna DevOps. Antingen fullstack, back-end eller front-end. Vi söker både dig som har ett par års erfarenhet och dig som är mer senior inom utveckling.
  
Erfarenhet av agila processer
  
Intresse för att utvecklas inom ditt hantverk

title: Typescript-utvecklare
description:
Vi söker en nyfiken och driven fullstack utvecklare.
  
PLAYipp, ett ledande svenskt SaaS-bolag inom digitala informationsskärmar, utökar nu vårt team för integrationer.Vi söker därför en nyfiken och driven fullstack-utvecklare med erfarenhet inom front-end frameworks och Node.js.
  
På PLAYipp är vi specialiserade på att skapa en heltäckande användarvänlig lösning som hjälper företag i alla storlekar att hantera och visa innehåll sömlöst över olika skärmar, vilket leder till förbättrad kommunikation och engagemang gentemot besökare, kunder och medarbetare. En viktig del i detta är integrationer mot andra system och det är vad teamet ansvarar för.
  
  

**Teamets huvudsakliga ansvarsområden består av :**  

**Front-end:** webb-appar för snygg uppvisning av data
  
**Back-end:** integrering mot tredjepart system
  
  

Krav
  
En stark vilja att utvecklas och samarbeta i ett växande team, samt något av följande:
  
Yrkeserfarenhet inom front- och back-end utveckling
  
Fullstack-erfarenhet
  
Gedigen Github-profil inom området
  
  

Det finns möjlighet att arbeta remote en viss del av tiden.
  
Meriterande
  
Typescript
  
MongoDB
  
Node.js
  
Javascript
  
MySQL
  
Git
  
Linux
  
PHP

title: Senior Fullstack-utvecklare C# - Konsult och Delägare
description:
bba; är ett ungt och dynamiskt konsultbolag på en spännande tillväxtresa. Hos oss är människorna i fokus — vi tror på att bygga företaget med rätt personer, vilket skapar grunden för ett framgångsrikt och hållbart företag. Vi värdesätter personlig utveckling, transparens och samarbete, och tillsammans formar vi den arbetsgivare vi själva drömmer om att jobba för.
  
Vi söker nu erfarna .Net-utvecklare som vill vara med och bygga den grund vårt företag ska expandera från. Som konsult hos oss får du en unik möjlighet att bli delägare, genom ett betydande aktieinnehav som en del av din signeringsbonus.
  
Vårt huvudkontor ligger i Stockholm, och vi har nyligen expanderat till Göteborg och Skåneregionen.
  
  

Om dig
  
Du har mer än 5 års erfarenhet av utveckling i C# .Net och har även goda kunskaper inom DevOps samt TypeScript-baserade ramverk. Som person är du öppen och trivs med att arbeta och umgås i en inkluderande miljö med engagerade kollegor. Du vill vara med på en gemensam resa för att bygga ett spännande företag som attraherar både talang och härlig energi.
  
Tjänsten kräver också att du behärskar svenska flytande, i både tal och skrift.

title: Java-/JavaScriptutvecklare för att förhindra brott
description:
Vill du vara med och vidareutveckla våra tjänster som hjälper kommuner, polisen och fastighetsbolag att förebygga brott och otrygghet?
  
Embrace Safetys systemstöd – EMBRACE – handlar om att kartlägga brott och otrygghet och om att utvärdera huruvida åtgärder faktiskt leder till mindre brott och otrygghet. Vi erbjuder system- och kunskapsstöd som hjälper kommuner, polismyndigheten, bostadsföretag och andra aktörer att samarbeta på effektivare sätt i deras brottsförebyggande och trygghetsfrämjande arbete.
  
Vi står på en stabil grund med flera hundra organisationer som använder våra tjänster idag. Vi är det ledande system- och kunskapsstödet för kunskapsbaserat brottsförebyggande arbete i Sverige och växer stadigt.
  
Vårt systemstöd/SaaS-tjänst; EMBRACE är under ständig utveckling och vi har flera innovativa och spännande saker med stor samhällsnytta i vår utvecklingsplan.
  
Vårt säte är i Örebro och vi sitter i trivsamma lokaler i centrala Örebro. Vi gillar att blanda den samhällsnytta vi gör med att ha kul och trivsamt på jobbet. Arbete på distans är möjligt. Läs mer om oss här: www.embrace-safety.se
  
  

**Dig vi letar efter:**  

Vi letar efter dig som älskar att utveckla och koda. Du behöver inte nödvändigtvis ha lång arbetslivserfarenhet.
  
Du kan åtminstone grunder i Java och JavaScript och vill gärna jobba med och utvecklas i det.
  
Du kan vara självständig och vill driva ditt eget arbete men gillar att arbeta i team och är inte rädd för att be om hjälp.
  
Du vill vara en del av en spännande och växande verksamhet som har framtiden för sig och som brinner för en positiv samhällsutveckling med mindre brott och otrygghet.
  
  

Arbetsuppgifter
  
Arbetet består främst av programmering som innebär utveckling av systemet. Alla våra medarbetare genomgår ett strukturerat introduktionsprogram.
  
  

Lön och typ av anställning
  
Vi tillämpar individuell lönesättning. Detta är en 100%-tillsvidaretjänst. Startdatum: Snarast men i överenskommelse med den som erbjuds tjänsten.
  
  

Ansökan
  
Din ansökan ska bestå av 1) ditt CV och 2) ett kort personligt brev. Skicka din ansökan per e-post till: ansokan@embrace-safety.se. Skriv i ämnesraden: ”Jobbansökan – Tjänst 2024-010”. Vi behöver din ansökan senast den 5:e december 2024. Vi behandlar dock ansökningar löpande så skicka gärna in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.
  
  

Kontakt
  
För eventuella frågor om tjänsten kontakta Henrik Andershed, tel: 070-6581381 eller henrik.andershed@embrace-safety.se

title: Senior Back-end Software Developer
description:
At Arkus AI, a pioneering startup based in Stockholm, we are at the forefront of harnessing artificial intelligence to revolutionize precision medicine. Our mission is to save lives and empower healthcare advancements by developing cutting-edge AI solutions to improve diagnosis, treatment, and patient outcomes. We are a highly competitive, dynamic, and forward-thinking team driven by a passion for making a tangible difference in people’s lives. With deep compassion and an unwavering commitment, our ambition is to enable fellow human beings to live healthier, better, and longer lives through our transformative innovations.
  
The Candidate
  
The ideal candidate is a self-motivated, multi-tasker, and demonstrated team player. You will be a senior developer responsible for developing new software products and enhancements to existing products. You should have strong expertise in working with healthcare applications and frameworks or the ability to quickly learn and excel in them, even if you haven't worked directly in healthcare before. You should have outstanding communication and leadership skills.
  
Responsibilities
  
Writing clean, high-quality, high-performance, maintainable code
  
Develop and support software, including applications, database integration, interfaces, and new functionality enhancements
  
Coordinate cross-functionally to ensure the project meets business objectives and compliance standards
  
Implement and test new products and features
  
Participate in code reviews
  
Configure, maintain and monitor our infrastructure to optimise performance.
  
Build and improve RESTful APIs.
  
Design and manage databases (SQL).
  
Ensure adherence to data security protocols and industry best practices.
  
Write unit and integration tests.
  
  

Qualifications & Skills
  
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science (or related field)
  
6+ years of professional experience in backend/software development
  
Proficiency in Node.js and Typescript, with expertise in SQL databases.
  
Hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD tools, Git, Jira, SQL databases, API development, and Linux/Unix environments. Familiarity with monitoring tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana), message queue systems, and event-driven architectures (e.g., RabbitMQ, Kafka).
  
Strong problem-solving skills, knowledge of software design patterns, and experience in building scalable systems.
  
Excellent communication skills and outstanding ability to work in a team.
  
Experience with Agile or Scrum software development methodologies
  
Ability to multi-task, organise, and prioritise work
  
  

What we can offer
  
An opportunity to embark on an ambitious journey to revolutionise precision care and save lives.
  
A dynamic, fast-paced start-up environment where your contributions will make a real impact, working alongside a team of exceptional colleagues.
  
The chance to develop next-generation healthcare tools powered by AI.
  
A hybrid work setup with access to our cutting-edge Stockholm office (Forskaren) a few times a week.
  
Flexible working hours to support work-life balance.
  
A competitive compensation package, including salary and equity options.

title: Senior Web Developer, Logistics (Elixir)
description:
**Auctionet** is a marketplace where auction houses from Sweden, the UK, Finland, Spain, Germany and Denmark sell furniture, art, design items, collectibles and more. We are a small, tight-knit Product & Development team, and are now in search of our next **Senior Web Developer for the Logistics team** – helping to build the next generation of logistics systems at Auctionet!

**About the work**
==================


The Logistics team is responsible for building the internal-facing logistics system that powers Auctionets shipping services. The ambition is to create the world's best auction marketplace, offering cost-efficient and reliable transport for buyers across the globe.


You will be working on building the next generation of logistics systems at Auctionet. This may include implementing algorithmic routing, building analytics dashboards to empower data-driven decision making and enabling cost-efficient transportation of items within our logistics network.


Our main stack is **Elixir**, with Phoenix LiveView and an event-driven architecture. We are self-hosted, managed by our own infrastructure team.


We work in cross-functional teams of developers, UX designers and product owners taking inspiration from the DDD movement and its practices. We take pride in working closely with stakeholders and domain experts, to ensure we create the best solution possible.


We often work as pairs, doing trunk-based development with continuous deployment, but try new approaches constantly and are not afraid to improve the process by changing things up.


We operate from our offices in central Stockholm and Malmö, with the option to work remotely. We value your well-being, offering flexible work hours, discouraging overtime, and encouraging full use of your Wellness Grant. You'll enjoy six weeks of paid vacation, along with a work phone and the computer of your choice to help you excel. Beyond supporting your lifestyle, we’re committed to your growth. That’s why we provide a generous budget and time allowance for attending conferences, code retreats, or courses, so you can continue learning and advancing your skills.

**About you**
=============

* We're looking for an experienced Elixir/Phoenix developer with an eye for detail who likes to take ownership over both big and small projects, and take them from start to production. You write clean, maintainable code that is well tested. We also believe you have:
* **Experience:** At least 5 years of professional web development experience.
* **Good communication skills:** You can explain complex concepts to both technical and non-technical co-workers.
* **A team player mentality:** You help others and ask for help when needed. We do a lot of pair programming!
* **Passion:** You take pride in your work and want to deliver code with high quality.
* **A curious mindset:** You are open to learning and sharing knowledge with others.


Due to the integrated nature of Phoenix you will work with both the front-end and back-end of the system.


Please note we are only accepting candidates **resident in Sweden** at this time. If that is you, apply now! Got questions? Reach out to our team anytime.

**The interview process**
=========================


In the interview process, we'll discuss some of your existing work, or a small take-home **Elixir** exercise, or we'll build a small feature inside our app. We don't do "gotcha" whiteboard interviews.

**Who we are**
==============


Auctionet was founded in 2011 by a team of people with unique experience of online auctions. Read **more about Auctionet here**. In 2021 Auctionet acquired the auction house Stockholms Auktionsverk, and we are now by far the largest auction marketplace in the Nordics, and one of the larger auction marketplaces in the world. With this acquisition, Auctionet owns and operates both the **oldest auction house in the world** (1674) and the **second oldest** (1681), which means we have been working with sustainability for 350(!) years. Join us in our mission to help new owners inspire new life into old items!

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
**Fullstack developer Emoco** 
  
 



  





**Do you find the future of automation and robotics exciting? Do you enjoy iterating solutions to discover new or improved interfaces and ways of doing things? If so, Emoco Labs might be the perfect workplace for you!** 
  
 



  





 We're an experienced team of independent thinkers who are passionate about creating high-quality systems. If you're self-motivated and quick to learn, we'd love for you to join us on our mission!
 



  





**About Emoco Labs** 
  
 



 Emoco Labs is an automation software and hardware company focused on providing a comprehensive platform for building, deploying, and managing automation solutions. Our platform aims to simplify the process of development and operation by offering a range of tools and services. At our in-house workshop, we develop a wide array of technologies for automation solutions and robots, including mechanics and electronics. Our technology stack includes web applications, real-time communication services, 3D web presentations, WebRTC services, and e-commerce. 
 



  





**Our vision: Simple and sustainable automation for everyone** 
  
 



 Our ambition is to create tools that lower the threshold for automation by making it simpler, cheaper, and more accessible to everyone—from small businesses and schools to labs and the industry. We offer entrepreneurs knowledge, resources, and services that enable them to grow, produce, and invest locally where they operate. 
 



  





**About our automation platform** 
  
 



 Emoco offers a cloud-based development environment where users can collaborate on design and development. Our platform includes tools for coding, testing, and debugging automation applications. We also provide infrastructure for receiving and transmitting real-time data, which can be used to improve performance, predict maintenance needs, and optimize operations. 
 



  





 Emoco provides a hardware abstraction layer based on the ROS 2 standard, allowing developers to write software that works with a variety of automation hardware without managing the specific details of each component. This abstraction makes it easy to integrate different sensors, actuators, and controllers, which is crucial for creating complex, interconnected systems that can interact seamlessly. 
 



  





**About the role** 
  
 



 We are looking for a
 **Full Stack Developer** 
 to join our growing team—a challenging and creative role that offers both variety and excellent development opportunities. 
 



  





 At Emoco Labs, your commitment to results is what matters—functionality, stability, reusability, and security. As a developer with us, you will be an important part of our journey as we launch and grow the company together with our team and customers. 
 



  





**Your responsibilities will include:** 
  
 


* Designing, building, and maintaining efficient, reusable, and reliable code
* Maintaining code quality through test automation and peer code reviews
* Building internal and external applications—from mobile apps and customer-facing order systems to scheduling algorithms and data analysis tools
* Playing an active role in defining our development processes and systems architecture
* Working with our technology stack: React, Next.js, NestJS, TypeScript, Python, WebRTC, GraphQL, and MySQL
* Researching the latest tools and technologies, evaluating them, and making recommendations on how to benefit from their use



  





**Emoco Labs also offers great future career opportunities—with us, you can take the next step as an expert, architect, team lead, or product owner.** 




  





**A few words from Anders Roxenhag, Senior Fullstack Software Engineer** 
  
 



*“Emoco is a friendly workplace where we help each other succeed in our roles. As a small team in the early stages of building the platform, your contributions will have an immediate impact and help shape the architecture and the service as a whole. At Emoco, thinking outside the box is strongly encouraged, and we expect high quality and strong ownership of your work. We value the freedom to choose the right tools for the task, and embrace the opportunity to use cutting-edge technologies. The close integration between disciplines and the chance to work at the intersection of software and custom hardware creates a fun and dynamic environment, especially for DIY enthusiasts like myself. I’d say Emoco Labs is a pretty unique workplace in that regard. The company’s goal to do good through innovation is also a big plus.”* 
  
 



  





**About you** 
  
 



 We believe that you are curious, self-driven, and enjoy being part of a fast-paced team. You are a great problem solver and stay up to date within your technical scope. You enjoy and has the capacity to work with complex systems. You take pride in creating reusable and reliable technical solutions, being both creative and detail-oriented. You are goal-oriented; taking initiative comes naturally to you, and you are always looking to receive and give feedback to grow both personally and professionally. 
 



  





**Requirements:** 
  
 


* Experience working as a software developer
* Proficiency in JavaScript and Node.js development
* Good communication skills in English



  





**It's a plus if you also have:** 
  
 


* Experience developing time-critical systems
* Participated in multiple diverse projects
* Knowledge of robotics, automation or embedded development
* Knowledge and experience in decision-making regarding technology and building system architecture



  





**How to apply** 
  
 



 Apply through LinkedIn or by sending an email. 
 



 Please note that you need to be eligible to work and live in Sweden. 
 



 We don't have the possibility to sponsor visas.
 



  





**Contact us** 
  
 



 If you have questions about Emoco Labs or the job, please contact: 
 



  





**Elin Goertz** 
  
 



 Email: elin.goertz@emoco.com 
 



 Phone: +46 723 251 351  
 



  





**About us** 
  
 



 Emoco Labs AB (https://emoco.com) is a subsidiary of Rector AB (https://rector.se). Rector is known for developing disruptive technology—one example is Neonode, the first touch-based smartphone. 
 



  





 We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Frontend Developer
job_function: Information Technology, Engineering, and Business Development
company_industry: Hospitals and Health Care, IT System Custom Software Development, and Software Development
description:
**Vill du vara med och göra skillnad i hälsoteknikens framkant? Bli en del av HPIs engagerade team och bidra till bättre hälsa och hållbara arbetsliv!** 




  





**Om HPI – Ett innovativt hälsoteknikföretag i tillväxt** 




 HPI är ett växande hälsoteknikföretag som kombinerar IT-utveckling, metodutveckling, dataanalys och forskning för att leverera den ledande digitala plattformen inom hälso- och arbetsmiljöutveckling i Norden.
 



  





 Genom deras plattform Plustoo erbjuder de tjänster och expertkunskap till företagshälsor, gym- och träningsanläggningar samt andra hälsoaktörer. Tillsammans hjälper de individer och arbetsgivare att främja hälsa och skapa hållbara arbetsliv. De bedriver uppmärksammad forskning i samarbete med bland annat Gymnastik- och idrottshögskolan (GIH) och har verkat i snart 50 år. Trots att de är ett mindre företag har de stor påverkan genom plattformen och deras världsunika databas med över tre decenniers insamlade data. Just nu befinner de sig i en spännande expansionsfas både i Sverige och Norge.
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Som frontend-utvecklare hos dem kommer du att arbeta med deras webbapplikation Plustoo. De söker dig som trivs i en teamorienterad miljö och vill bidra aktivt till att nå gemensamma mål. Utvecklingsarbetet är agilt och starkt präglat av samarbete, så de ser gärna att du är en lagspelare som gillar att dela idéer och lösningar.
 



  





 Eftersom de hanterar känsliga personuppgifter ställer de höga krav på kvalitet och säkerhet i allt de gör. Du kommer att arbeta nära ett engagerat team som inkluderar frontend- och backend-utvecklare, produktägare och utvecklingschef. Dessutom får du möjlighet att samarbeta med deras specialister inom hälsa och arbetsmiljö, vilket ger dig insikt i hur teknik kan förbättra hälsa och skapa hållbara arbetsliv.
 



  





**Din profil** 




 Vi söker en erfaren webbutvecklare med djup expertis inom Angular (eller likande) som är van vid att arbeta med de senaste teknikerna. Du håller dig ständigt uppdaterad inom utveckling och har en passion för kvalitet och innovation. Hos dem värdesätts även egenskaper som nyfikenhet, engagemang och ärlighet högt.
 



  





**De söker dig som:** 



* Är bekväm med
 **Angular** 
 med
 **signals, rxjs** 
 och
 **TypeScript** 
 , och har arbetat med dessa tekniker i flera år.
* Har erfarenhet av att utveckla med
 **reactive forms** 
 och kan bidra till att göra deras plattform mer robust, skalbar och dynamisk.
* Är noggrann och brinner för att skriva strukturerad, testbar kod, med ett fokus på kontinuerlig förbättring.
* Har gedigen erfarenhet inom
 **frontend-arkitektur** 
 och kan hantera både stora och små utvecklingsutmaningar.
* Är drivande, social och uppskattar att diskutera och lösa problem tillsammans med teamet. Du är aktiv i diskussioner, planering och beslut för att säkerställa långsiktig kvalitet.
* Är en expert på testning, med erfarenhet av att använda
 **Jest** 
 för enhetstester.
* Är van att göra pull-requests och genomföra code reviews.
* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta med
 **WCAG/WAI-ARIA** 
 för tillgänglighet.
* Behärskar både svenska och engelska flytande, i tal och skrift.



  





**Bonus om du:** 



* Har god erfarenhet av E2E-tester och kan bidra till utvecklingen av deras testplattform.



  





**De erbjuder** 




 HPI drivs av en vision om ett samhälle där människor upplever en god hälsa och har ett hållbart arbetsliv. De tror starkt på att arbetsplatsen är en idealisk arena för hälsofrämjande insatser. De erbjuder bland annat träning på arbetstid och friskvårdsbidrag. Hos dem får du konkurrenskraftiga anställningsvillkor, sex veckors semester, tjänstepension och sjukvårdsförsäkring. De värnar om balans mellan arbete och fritid, med flexibel arbetstid och möjligheten att arbeta i en hybrid arbetsmiljö. Även om de uppmuntrar samarbete på deras kontor på centrala Södermalm i Stockholm, ger de också möjlighet till distansarbete.
 



 Deras rymliga kontor delas med systerbolag inom Health- och Medtech-sektorn, som ingår i deras koncern
 *Carasent* 
 , vilket skapar spännande möjligheter och samarbeten.
 



  





**Om Carasent** 




 Bolagen i Carasent-koncernen utvecklar och levererar ett ekosystem av integrerade SaaS-tjänster inom olika typer av vård. Genom en bred portfölj av IT-system och applikationer, som molnbaserade journalsystem, verktyg för digital patientkommunikation och digitala vårdmöten, BI-lösningar och ett flertal partnerintegrationer, erbjuder Carasent den mest flexibla lösningen för vårdgivare på den nordiska marknaden idag.
 



  





 Carasent har idag drygt 150 anställda på sina kontor i Sverige och Norge och är listat på Oslo Börs. Kunderna återfinns inom primärvård, specialistvård, företagshälsovård och rehabilitering, primärt inom privat sektor. Huvudkontoret ligger i Göteborg.
 



  





 Företag inom koncernen: Carasent Sverige, Metodika AB, Carasent NO, Medrave Software AB och HPI Health Profile Institute AB.
 



  





**Innan anställning kan bli aktuell kommer en bakgrundskontroll att genomföras. De använder bakgrundskontroller från SRI. Vid frågor som rör rollen kontakta gärna
 *zoe.lepluart@ninox-limited.com.***




  





**Är det dig de beskrivit ovan? Då är du varmt välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. De går igenom urvalet löpande och annonsen ligger uppe tills de tillsatt tjänsten.**

title: Software Engineer: Full Stack
description:
At EasyPark, we love cities. We love them for work, for play, and everything in between. That’s why our vision is to make cities more livable! EasyPark Group is a global company and a true leader in its domain. There is a clear ambition to quickly grow in coverage and offer our services to more customers and partners.
   

  

 This is an exciting opportunity to become part of the EasyPark team as a Software Engineer. You will play a key role in our future success and have a true opportunity to make a real impact and difference for our users and our business!
   

  

**Firstly, a Bit About The Team**
 You will join a cross functional distributed team of 6 engineers that are responsible for the web self service portal for our B2B customers. Today we are mostly focused on front end development but have recently done our first back end microservice in the team. Since we are moving towards teams that have full end to end ownership we are looking for a new team member that can drive the modularization of existing functionality as well building new microservices.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Backend Development: Lead the design and development of backend services, expanding our existing capabilities and helping the team advance in backend technologies. Lead the design and development of new backend microservices as well as modularization of existing functionality in our backend to microservices.
* Front-End Development: Work closely with our front-end developers to integrate full-stack features, ensuring a cohesive, robust user experience. And if and when needed do front end development as well.
* Architecture & Design: Collaborate with other engineers on architectural strategy and technical investigations, serving as a critical partner in defining and implementing scalable solutions.
* Distributed Team Collaboration: Embrace a distributed working environment, proactively engaging in effective remote collaboration to ensure team cohesion and productivity.


**What You’ll Bring To The Team**
* Problem-Solving: Skilled at addressing complex development challenges with a systematic and efficient approach.
* Collaboration: Communicates effectively and works well in agile, cross-functional teams.
* Team Player: Supports colleagues, provides well-reasoned input, and remains open to diverse perspectives.
* Adaptability: Thrives in dynamic, fast-paced environments and adapts smoothly to changing requirements.
* Detail-Oriented: Focused on code quality, debugging, and thorough testing.
* Innovation & Initiative: Proactively contributes fresh ideas and seeks continuous improvement opportunities.


**Core Tech Requirements**
* Minimum 3 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer
* Extensive experience with Kotlin, React and Express frameworks
* Experience working with microservices architecture and being able to develop and maintain high-performance backend systems.
* Experience of working in an agile environment
* Professional fluency in English
* Proficiency in Kotlin, React, Express, Node.js, JavaScript/TypeScript
* Experience with CI/CD, specifically GitHub Actions
* Knowledge of RESTful API development and integration
* Strong understanding of front-end and back-end systems
* Familiarity with cloud services like AWS


**What We Offer**
* Flexible ways of working: combine working from home with working from the office, whatever is agreed on within your team.
* Digital global onboarding: three days to indulge in learning & connecting with fellow new starters across the globe.
* Pension, insurances & health reimbursement: A competitive pension, in combination with the basic package of insurances
* Proactive health support: your wellbeing is important to us, which is why we offer proactive medical support, all depending on your need.
* Mental well-being support via Blue Call
* Wellness reimbursement: 5000 SEK/Year

title: Blockchain Developer - Intern (Remote Internship - IT)
description:
Are you ready to dive into the world of blockchain development? Kreativstorm, a dynamic and innovative management-consulting firm based in Berlin, Germany, is offering a unique internship opportunity for aspiring blockchain developers. Work remotely with our multinational team and gain hands-on experience in this cutting-edge field!
   

  

 If you're passionate about blockchain technology and love solving problems, this internship is perfect for you. You'll work on various blockchain projects, learning about smart contracts, decentralized applications (DApps), consensus algorithms, and blockchain security. Gain real-world experience developing blockchain solutions, all from the comfort of your home.
   

  

**Internship Overview and Details:**
**Location:** 
 Fully Remote
   

  

**Schedule:** 
 Part-Time Internship
   

  

**Duration:** 
 3 months with the possibility of permanent employment after the internship period
   

  

**Requirements**
**Ideal Candidates:**
* Students pursuing a degree or recent graduates in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
* Blockchain enthusiasts eager to explore the potential of decentralized technologies.
* Analytical thinkers who enjoy understanding and designing complex algorithms.
* Team players with strong communication skills.
* Detail-oriented individuals who thrive in fast-paced, tech-driven environments.
* Some initial industry experience is a big plus.
* Those with some experience in blockchain platforms and programming languages (e.g., Ethereum, Solidity, Hyperledger) are preferred but not required.
* Basic understanding of blockchain protocols and cryptography is a plus.


**Your Role:**
* Contribute to blockchain development projects by designing and implementing smart contracts and DApps.
* Work with our development team to explore new use cases and optimize existing solutions.
* Assist in conducting blockchain security assessments and implementing best practices.
* Bring innovative solutions to blockchain challenges and stay updated on emerging trends.
* Help document blockchain architectures, protocols, and project details.


**Benefits**
**Why Join Us?**
 Kreativstorm is a dynamic and innovative management-consulting firm headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Our team of experienced consultants bring a diverse range of talents and backgrounds, allowing us to provide tailored solutions to businesses of all sizes and industries. As part of the Yes Network Group, LLC, a reputable US holding company, we have access to extensive resources and expertise. Join us and start your journey in blockchain development today!
   

  

 Apply now and pave the way for your future in blockchain technology!

title: Backend developer for a unique project
description:

 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 IT

 Full time, long term
 



  

**Start date :**
 Immediate
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
   




**About the role**

 We are looking for a Backen developer. In this project, you’ll be part of building a brand-new app designed to transform the company's sales process. The system will transition from a single-tenant to a multi-tenant architecture, enabling support for multiple users or entities within the same environment. You'll be joining a passionate project team dedicated to further developing a product that stands out as one-of-a-kind. This is an exceptional opportunity for someone who’s passionate about digital solutions and eager to join a growth journey from startup to scale-up. More details about the project and its scope will be shared in an initial conversation, but one thing is certain – this is a project you won’t want to miss.
 


  


  

**We’re looking for someone who can start immediately and is ready to dive into this exciting assignment. Please note that no notice period is required for this role.**



  


  

**We are also looking for a tester to the same project. You can find the advert here!**



**We are looking for**
  
* At least three years of experience in Backend developing. Techniques: Java, Spring Boot and Docker.
  


  


  

**It is meritorious if you have**

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.

title: System Developer
description:
Front end

description:
**Note: This Opportunity Does Not Offer Employment, but rather an opportunity to build your own VC-backed startup!** 




  





**Who you are:** 




 You are a highly accomplished full-stack software developer with a demonstrated ability to deliver innovative solutions. Your exceptional programming skills and experience in building complex applications position you to tackle significant challenges within the tech industry. You possess a strong problem-solving aptitude and a passion for pioneering cutting-edge technologies. Driven to make a real impact, you're eager to leverage your expertise in building disruptive tech ventures.
 



  





**About Antler** 




 Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders from more than 135,000 applicants across our 27 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 7,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,000 startups.
 



  





**The Antler Founder Residency** 




 Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.
 


* 12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
* Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
* Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
* Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success



  





**Program Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 March 3rd, 2025
* **Location:** 
 Onsite at our Stockholm office
* **Compensation:** 
 While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
* **Visa Sponsorship:** 
 Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.



  





**For our March 2025 cohort, we’re looking for someone who:** 



* Having the autonomy to develop sophisticated software solutions to address real-world challenges, merging ingenuity with functionality.
* Exceptional problem-solving and analytical skills, capable of breaking down complex issues and bringing structure into business cases
* Providing leadership, whether it’s directing a development team or managing comprehensive product delivery.
* You have an idea that you believe can solve a problem you are deeply interested in. You understand that you need co-pilots who share your vision and values.



  





**Application Process** 




 Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:
 


1. Apply through our website.
2. Participate in an introductory interview.
3. Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
4. Receive a potential offer.



  





**Antler Success Stories** 




 Several companies built through the Antler program have received pre-seed investment and have gone on to secure significant funding rounds. Here are just a few examples:
 


* **Wingbits:** 
 A community-driven flight data tracking platform
* **Two:** 
 A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
* **Evyon:** 
 A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
* **Glint Solar:** 
 Software accelerating the identification of optimal solar installation sites.
* **PerPlant:** 
 AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture.

title: Senior Full Stack Developer to Mynewsdesk
description:
*Are you a full stack developer with a passion for web technologies and love to build smart, robust and high-quality solutions that reaches thousands of users and customers every day?*
 We are looking for a
 **full stack developer** 
 to help us develop the market leading PR platform in the Nordics, with the vision "
 *Building awareness and relations today, creating a positive impact on the society of tomorrow"* 
*.*
**What is it like to work at Mynewsdesk?**
 Mynewsdesk is an international workplace with around 15 developers of diverse expertise split into different teams. The teams collaborate closely with product managers, designers, data scientists, and test engineers to drive innovation and success. We promote a challenger culture where individuals and teams are encouraged to think outside the box.
   

  

 We believe that you perform at your best when working on tasks that are both fun and challenging. To support this, we have separated working tracks led by a product manager and teams guided by a technical engineering manager. You have the flexibility to choose and switch between different tracks or avoid a track entirely if you prefer to focus on a specific technical project.
   

  

**Our stack**
 Our tech stack is built mainly with Ruby on Rails in the backend, React in the frontend and GraphQL in between.
   

  

 We use various big data services to process our customers data and the media landscape around us, to allow a truly data driven PR workflow. For collaborating effectively, we are using many of the standard tools such as Github, Jira, Slack and G-Suite.
   

  

**What will you do?**
* Design our GraphQL schema and implement the resolvers in Ruby-on-rails.
* Develop backend code in Ruby and Node.js, integrating with various databases and services, including Clickhouse, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, and OpenAI.
* Help out with the development of our React components.
* Be a part of a team of experienced developers collaborating closely with designers and product leads.
* Review and improve our continuous integration setup and deployment of our solutions.
* Coach other developers and help the team grow and develop in their role.
* Contribute to discussions and implementation of improving our platform to handle the future requirements of our users.


**Who are you?**
* You are a developer who can work with React, GraphQL and Rails.
* You have solid experience with Ruby on Rails and a strong track record in developing and maintaining RoR codebases.
* You’re proud of the work that you do and you know how to balance quality and delivery.
* You enjoy working in an agile environment and being responsible for the technical design, implementation, maintenance and testing of software.
* You are an active and driving participant during discoveries and plannings.
* You have a passion for product development and you get satisfaction from seeing your solutions deployed to production fast.
* You are fluent in English and Swedish.


**Apply now and let’s grow together! 🌟**
 We have fun, we are challengers, and we provide a market-leading PR platform.
   

  

 Answer the questions in the application process and preferably apply with your LinkedIn profile. No CV or cover letter is required.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application! 🌟
   

  

 Questions? Contact Engineering Manager peter.nycander@mynewsdesk.com or
   

  

 Talent Acquisition Manager linda.stuve@mynewsdesk.com
   

  

 Mynewsdesk is a true pioneer, providing communicators with a modern digital PR service. With just one click, you can give the right audiences direct access to relevant press releases, blog posts, social media feeds, high-resolution images and graphics, videos, and more – at the right time. Influencers can start following your newsroom, engage with content, and become part of a network of influencers.

title: Senior Backend Developer
description:
Requisition ID: 21134
Job Category: Information Technology
Career level: Specialist
Contract type: Permanent
Location:
Gothenburg, SE  

*Are you experienced in AI and cloud development? Do you thrive on building innovative solutions and integrating cutting-edge technologies? Join us to leverage generative AI and other advanced tools to transform business processes, enhance efficiency, and drive impactful change. Then you could be our next...*  



**Senior Backend developer**  

**AI Center of Excellence**

  


As a backend developer in our AI Center of Excellence, you will be at the forefront of building the applications enabling AI in our operations. You will work in a cross-functional team to ensure the successful development of AI-driven application into business processes, driving innovation, and enhancing operational efficiency. You will be hands-on involved in the scoping, designing, building, and delivery of our next-generation solutions.

  


The role is a key position in our new AI Center of Excellence team and will be the backbone of setting up our technical assistants. The AI CoE is positioned within SKF Technology Development but will serve across the global organization, supporting different units on their journey and running development activities under our responsibility.

  


**Key responsibilities**


* **Backend Development - Primary Focus**: Develop and maintain server-side logic in C# and Python, focusing on API development, microservices, and integration with Azure components such as Redis Cache, Cosmos DB, and Azure OpenAI.
* **Frontend Development - Occasional:** Design and implement user interfaces using React, TypeScript, or JavaScript to ensure a responsive, user-friendly experience for AI/ML-powered applications.
* **Machine Learning Integration:** Collaborate with data scientists and ML engineers to integrate models effectively into the Azure environment, leveraging Azure AI services, including Azure AI Search and OpenAI.
* **End-to-End Azure Solution Development:** Manage the full lifecycle of application development, including deployment automation with GitHub Actions and quality assurance through testing frameworks and code reviews, ensuring reliable, scalable applications within Azure environments.
* **Cross-Functional Collaboration:** Work closely with DevOps, AI Engineers, and other cross-functional team members to ensure cohesive, timely, and secure delivery of AI-driven use cases.

  




**We expect you to have**


* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, engineering, or a related field or equivalent work experience.
* Work experience as a backend developer, where you gained strong backend development skills in C# and Python.
* Experience in frontend languages and frameworks, specifically React, TypeScript, and JavaScript.
* Proficient in cloud-based solutions, specifically Azure services such as API Management, Redis Cache, Cosmos DB, Azure Functions, and Azure AI (OpenAI, AI Search).
* Hands-on experience with GitHub and GitHub Actions for CI/CD and deployment automation.
* Understanding of DevOps principles, CI/CD pipelines, and agile development methodologies.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams in an Azure-focused environment.
* Experience in building and deploying Microsoft Teams bots is a plus.

  

  

*SKF is committed to creating a diverse environment, and we firmly believe that a diverse workforce is essential for our continued success. Therefore, we only focus on your experience, skills, and potential. Come as you are – just be yourself.* *#weareSKF*  



**You will enjoy working here if you (are/have)**  

You thrive in a fast-paced, innovative environment, valuing teamwork and stakeholder interaction. With strong leadership and collaboration skills, you inspire teams and build relationships across all levels. Your open-minded, solution-oriented, and proactive approach ensures you overcome challenges and drive strategic AI initiatives.  

  

**Some additional information**  

This position will be based in Gothenburg.  

You will report to Linda Örtlund, Manager AI CoE, who is based in Gothenburg, Sweden. If you have any questions about the position, please contact her at teams or linda.ortlund@skf.com.  

For questions regarding the recruitment process, please contact Josefin Nelson, Recruitment Expert EMEA, at stina.scheller@skf.com. Please note that we can't accept applications via email.

  


**Is this you?**  

If the answer is yes, submit your application no later than December 1st, 2024.

title: Software Engineer(C#, React)
description:
**Can you engineer a brighter tomorrow?**

  


At Volvo Cars, we are always looking for world-class developers who bring out the best in our people. If you want to be part of leading and inspiring our mission to change the automotive experience and make people’s lives less complicated, then we have the opportunity for you.

  


**Let's introduce ourselves**
-----------------------------

  

In our cluster Quality & Compliance, a part of Engineering Digital, we are now hiring one Software Engineer in the Product Certification team. As a Software Engineer you will be part of the whole development lifecycle: from working as a liaison among different stakeholders to understand the business and user needs, to take an active part in backlog refinement in accordance with the Product Owner and to build, test, ship and improve the deliverables. You will join a talented and great team of 8 people; Developers, UX and one Product Owner.

  


Our tech stack:

  


* .NET Core (C#)
* React (TypeScript)
* SQL in Microsoft Azure
* Creating and managing CI/CD pipelines in GitHub
* Azure Services and Platform Knowledge

Ways of working:  



* You develop unit tests and use version control.
* You understand the product development and Agile mindset.
* You are driven to explore new technologies through research and investigation.
* You understand the users needs and collaborate closely with internal stakeholders.
**What you will do**
--------------------

  

As a Software engineer your will design and develop applications and systems. Perform business analysis and software analysis. You may coordinate projects and perform system maintenance activities.  



Job Responsibilities:  



* **Application Software Development:** Develop existing and new applications by analyzing and identifying areas for modification and improvement. Develop new applications to meet customer requirements.
* **Applications Software Maintenance:** Monitor, identify, and correct the most-complex software defects to maintain fully functioning applications software.
* **Design and Conceptualization:** Work effectively with cross-functional teams to conceptualize products and services, leveraging data to drive original design ideas and decisions.
* **Technical Developments:** Discuss and recommend technical developments to improve the quality of the website/portal/applications software and supporting infrastructure to better meet users need.
**What you'll bring**
---------------------

  

 We believe that you are a team player with excellent communication and documentation skills. You have a positive attitude and are a supportive person to your colleagues. You are eager to learn from your colleagues and teach what you know. Collaboration comes natural to you, and you involve and engage stakeholders to be able to deliver the best suited solutions for every situation.

  


Required Qualifications


* Master’s degree or equivalent combination of education.
* Agile methodologies (SCRUM, DevOps/DevSecOps)
* Ability to write features and stories in an effective format
* Full stack developer with technical knowledge in


	+ .NET Core (C#)
	+ React (TypeScript)
	+ SQL in Microsoft Azure.
* Creating and managing CI/CD pipelines in GitHub
* Azure Services and Platform Knowledge
* Test automation

**Ready to Take the Next Step?**
---------------------------------

  

  

Please submit your application through our career page. Due to GDPR regulations, we’re unable to store or consider applications from other platforms. Make sure to submit your application in English.

  

  

Once your application is successfully submitted, you’ll receive a confirmation email. We’re excited to get to know you!

  



**Volvo Cars – driving change together**
-----------------------------------------

  

  

Volvo Cars’ success is the result of a collaborative, diverse and inclusive working environment. Today, we’re one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with around 43,000 employees across the globe. At Volvo Cars, your career is designed around your skills and aspirations, so you can reach your fullest potential.  

  

And it’s so exciting – we’re well on our way on our journey towards full electrification. We have five fully electric cars already on the market, and five more on the way. Our fully-electric and plug-in hybrid cars combined make up almost 50 per cent of our sales. So come and join us in shaping the future of mobility. There’s never been a more rewarding time to play your part in our inspiring and creative teams!  



Curious about Life at Volvo Cars? Read more


Curious about our story? Read more

title: UX Copy Content Creator – Solna – Frilans
description:
Kommunikation 18 november 2024
**UX Copy Content Creator – Solna – Frilans**
=============================================


Anställningsform: Konsult



Start & slutdatum: 1 januari 2025 – 1 januari 2026  

Placeringsort: Stockholm  

Omfattning: 40 h/vecka  

Remote: 25%



OBS: Kunden går ut mycket brett för denna roll, du finner samma annons på flera ställen så välj noga vem du vill ska presentera dig.



För vår kund kommer människan alltid först. Och tekniken först därefter. Deras kunder ska alltid kunna vara uppkopplade med de och det som betyder mest för dem. Deras övertygelse är att uppkopplade samhällen är starkare samhällen. Som medarbetare kommer du att vara en viktig pusselbit i en större internationell organisation som vill skapa samhällsnytta genom att leverera förstklassig uppkoppling i de samhällen de verkar.



Vår kund letar efter en erfaren UX Copy Lead med gedigen kunskap och erfarenhet. Vår kund befinner sig i en pågående och offensiv digital transformation, och de välkomnar individer som kan erbjuda innovativa lösningar, ta ägarskap och proaktivt driva företaget framåt genom effektiv produktion och leverans.



Om tjänsten  

Vår kund söker en kreativ och strategisk Content Creator som är duktig på UX copy för ett vikariat på ett år. I denna roll kommer du att vara avgörande för att förbättra användarupplevelsen genom att skapa engagerande och effektivt innehåll för digitala plattformar. Du blir en del av en kreativ hub där tillsammans använder all deras gemensamma kompetens, passion, erfarenhet och skicklighet att skapa grym, enhetlig och relevant kommunikation för hela företaget i syfte att stärka relationen med kunder.



Din roll  

I rollen som Content Creator kommer du att utforma kundkommunikation enligt vår kunds tonalitet i form av mejl, SMS och brev, samt på deras digitala plattformar som app och webb. Du kommer att delta i planering, beställning och genomförande av kommunikationsinsatser i deras egna digitala kanaler tillsammans med teamet för att stärka de digitala kundresorna. Arbetet med både långsiktiga projekt och snabba uppgifter, i nära samarbete med olika person inom organisationen så som projektledare, IT, kampanjtekniker, designers, produktägare mm.



Vem du är  

Du är en erfaren Content creator/Digital marknadsförare som gärna arbetar med helheten kring kommunikationen, från planering till slutförande. Du har flera års erfarenhet av marknadsföring och kommunikation, både i bild och skrift. Du är van att använda olika CMS som Episerver/Optimizely, Contentful och CRM-system. Du har ett intresse för bildbehandling och goda kunskaper inom Photoshop, Adobe Creative Suite eller liknande. Vår kund ser också att du har en djup förståelse för vad som driver försäljning, lojalitet och kundbeteende digitalt.



Som person är du:  

Engagerad, lösningsorienterad och analytisk med förmåga att snabbt sätta dig in i arbetsuppgifter och företaget.Positiv, prestigelös och villig att utmana dig själv samt våga testa olika typer av kommunikationsstilar.Strukturerad och självständig i ditt arbete, men också kapabel att genomföra projekt tillsammans med teametFörutom din erfarenhet från liknande roller, bidrar du till en positiv företagskultur.



Vår kunds löfte  

Nyckeln till framgång är en balanserad arbetskraft. För att säkra det arbetar vår kund aktivt för att främja en arbetsmiljö där deras anställda får stöd och egenmakt inom alla sina arbetsområden. De lovar dig ett mänskligt företag som har hög vilja till självförbättring och att snabbt anpassa sig till en digitaliserad värld. Du välkomnas varmt in till ett skickligt team av professionella kolleger och utöver detta erbjuder de även:  

Ett flexibelt arbetssätt – vår kund tror på att flexibiliteten och friheten att välja var och när du levererar i ditt arbete bidrar till ökad prestation, engagemang och balans i livet. Vår kund tror också på styrkan i att de är bättre tillsammans och att teamandan utvecklas när de möts och interagerar med varandra, därför ser de att deras kontor ska agera som magneter för samarbete, kreativitet och företagsanda.Utbildningsprogram så att du som medarbetare kan fördjupa din kunskap och bredda kompetensen.Ett generöst hälsovårdspaket innehållandes exempelvis Give me a break-days, friskvårdsbidrag, tjänstepension och mycket mer.



Bra att känna till  

Enligt vår kunds policy genomför de bakgrundskontroll på slutkandidat för samtliga rekryteringar.

title: Software Development Engineer to Peratech
description:
The Software Development Engineer is someone with excellent analytical, problem solving, algorithm and design skills, who can architect, develop, and implement graphical UI software as an important part of our global Product and Solutions Development team. The engineer will use his/her technical background to devise innovative solutions for these requirements, working closely with local and global engineering teams, and managing external resources. The Peratech Product and Solutions team has created a centre of excellence for software and hardware in Stockholm and the postholder will be part of that. The engineer will also be part of a global solutions team, with colleagues and internal and external customers all over the world. Therefore, this job could include up to 20 travel days a year internationally, especially to Asia and occasionally within Europe.
  
DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
  
* Under the direction of our Software Manager, works closely with our electronics, firmware and mechanical engineering teams to design new code and/or adapt existing code to provide best in class integration and performance between UIs, embedded systems and cloud systems, giving optimum user experience for Peratech’s pressure/force-sensing solutions for our customers
* In conjunction with UX/UX/IxD designers, other engineers and technical sales teams, defines product specifications from functional requirements and determine UI software needs for customers. Uses capabilities and experience to define any missing requirements
* Creates and implements UI solutions for those internal and external customers based on customer requirements
* Creates application and customer documentation allowing customers to easily use Peratech sensors in a wide variety of products
* Tests and deploys applications and solutions


REQUIREMENTS AND EXPERIENCE
  
* A Bachelors level or above in Software Engineering, Computer Science or a related discipline
* At least five years' experience in professional software engineering with a proven ability to deliver products on time and on budget
* Experience and practical knowledge creating, developing, and implementing UIs
* Windows software development in C++, C# and Python, ideally with.NET development, UWP, WPF
* Knowledge and experience in cloud connectivity. API definition to expose our software features to other software packages
* Interfacing to and integration with online AI/ML systems,Integration with APIs on other software packages
* An analytical team player, who likes to find solutions to customer’s needs in cooperation with teams around the world
* Fluency in spoken and written English, with communication skills at a professional level.
* A valid work permitin Sweden


ADDITIONAL USEFUL EXPERIENCE
  
* Source control via Azure DevOps, GITOps, GIT
* Basic firmware development, ideally in an ARM environment
* Knowledge of implementation of embedded communications protocols, including USB, Bluetooth, I2C, SPI and UART
* Experience designing modules for human machine interfaces, such as control panels and membrane switches, touch screens, track pads, keypads, dials, controls and other physical interfaces into handheld or fixed electronics devices
* Experience implementing automated testing platforms and unit testsPython and/or
* Python and/orAndroid software UI development


WHAT WE OFFER
  
* You will work with cutting edge technology
* Great development opportunities, as You will be working with a very professional team, in a tech savvy company - a company that supports your development
* A very dynamic environment, in a company with a strong development
* Comprehensive terms
* Full time employment based in our facilities in central Stockholm, with flexible remote work


CONTACT AND HOW TO APPLY
  
For this recruitment, we have partnered with XLNT Search. Should you have queries regarding these roles or the recruitment process, please contact Ulf Magnusson, +46 70 569 09 28 or mail ulf.magnusson@xlnt.se
  
We apply continuous selection during this recruitment process, so do send us your application promptly
  
We are looking forward to your application!
  
ABOUT PERATECH
  
Peratech is a pressure-sensing technology solutions company that provides next-generation touch and haptics solutions to some of the most exciting and innovative companies in automotive, industrial, musical instrument, electronic appliance, and consumer electronics markets.
  
Our patented HF-QTC technology sits at the crossroads of Physics and Chemistry, requiring a balance of clever thinking and problem-solving in Materials Science, Mechanical, Software and Electronics engineering to take full advantage of its properties.
  
We are a small team of passionate technologists, engineers, scientists, and problem solvers looking for the best fellow teammates to help make our company a great success. We are an equal opportunity employer that believes the best people come from all walks of life all over the world.

title: Senior AI Engineer
description:
For one of our clients we're looking to strengthen the team with the following:
  
**Job Title:** Senior AI Engineer
  
**Location:** Onsite, Central Stockholm
  
**Employment Type:** Full-Time
  
  

**About Us:**  

We are developing an internal AI tool designed to enhance efficiency across our operations, engineering, and commercial departments. Powered by Gemini and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), our system leverages cutting-edge AI to streamline processes and drive innovation. Our infrastructure is hosted on Google Cloud Platform (GCP), with a Python-based backend and a frontend built using open-webui.
  
  

**Role Overview:**  

We’re looking for a Senior AI Engineer to join our team in central Stockholm. In this role, you will be responsible for maintaining and evolving our AI systems, ensuring the backend is robust, and managing the training and performance of our models. You will also work closely with the team to ensure seamless integration with our frontend.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

Maintain and enhance the Python-based backend for the AI system.
  
Oversee the training and tuning of models to ensure optimal performance and scalability.
  
Implement and refine Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) techniques.
  
Collaborate with the frontend team to integrate and optimize open-webui interfaces.
  
Monitor and optimize system performance on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Datadog.
  
  

**Preferred Skills & Experience:**  

Extensive experience in Python for backend development.
  
Strong knowledge of Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) and related AI techniques.
  
Expertise in model training pipelines and deployment.
  
Familiarity with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and its services.
  
Experience with open-webui or similar frontend frameworks.
  
Knowledge of TypeScript and frontend development (preferred but not required).
  
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team.
  
  

**What We Offer:**  

Competitive salary and benefits.
  
The opportunity to work onsite in central Stockholm with a talented, innovative team.
  
Hands-on experience with state-of-the-art AI technologies and tools.
  
A key role in shaping and improving our internal AI tools.
  
  

**How to Apply:**  

Send your CV and a brief cover letter to careers@uxsthlm.se. Highlight relevant experience and projects that demonstrate your expertise in AI, backend development, and model training.

title: Content SEO Specialist
description:
Are you driven by the power of digital content and passionate about using SEO strategies to enhance online visibility? Do you thrive on crafting content that resonates with audiences and boosts engagement? Join **Kjell & Company** as our new **Content** **SEO specialist** as we expand our team and take a leading role in advancing our digital reach and brand impact.


At Kjell & Company, we foster a culture of innovation and growth, where digital content is central to our mission. As our Content SEO Specialist, you’ll help shape our digital narrative, attract organic traffic, and ensure an exceptional user experience across all digital channels for Kjell Group’s companies.


**Key Responsibilities – Content** **SEO specialist ‍**

* **Optimize** **content** for SEO: Implement SEO best practices across all Kjell Group online channels, including homepage, category pages, product pages, and campaign content, to boost visibility and drive organic traffic.
* **Content management & quality assurance**: Ensure all content is accurate, relevant, and easy to navigate, enhancing the online customer journey.
* **Performance analysis & insights**: Track and analyze content performance, using insights to continually improve engagement and conversion rates.
* **Cross-Functional** collaboration: Work closely with marketing, product and category, and design teams to ensure content aligns with Kjell & Company’s broader marketing objectives.
* **Stay** **current with trends**: Keep up to date with digital marketing trends, new SEO techniques, and innovations in digital content creation.

**Required** **skills & qualifications**

* **Proven** **SEO and conversion experience**: 2-3 years of hands-on SEO experience. Strong grasp of SEO principles and conversion optimization strategies to maximize content effectiveness.
* **Digital** **content knowledge:** Background in digital content creation, optimization, and management, ideally for e-commerce or customer-centric platforms.
* **Exceptional** communication skills: Fluent in Swedish, with strong written and verbal communication abilities.
* **Content** management proficiency: Experience with CMS platforms and familiarity with web content best practices.
* **Creative and Tech-Savvy**: A creative thinker with a passion for technology and a knack for engaging content ideas that resonate with customers’ daily needs.

**Preferred** **qualifications**

* **Retail** **industry experience**: Previous experience in a similar role within retail or e-commerce is a plus.
* **UX design**: Knowledge of UX design principles and UX design software is advantageous.

**Join Kjell & Company** to be a part of a team dedicated to innovation and customer engagement through outstanding digital content. Elevate our brand and connect with a tech-savvy audience – apply now to make an impact as our new **Content** SEO specialist.

 **What we offer**

  

At Kjell & Company, we value our employees and aim to provide a supportive and collaborative work environment where you want to work, grow and stay.

**Application Process**


If you are ready to take the next step in your career and join a forward-thinking company, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your application, including a CV by the application deadline.

**Application Deadline:** December 31 st


We look forward to reviewing your application and potentially welcoming you to the Kjell & Company family!


Best regards,
  

Kjell & Company

title: Senior Product Designer
description:
**Shape the Future of AI-Powered Customer Service**


Do you want to join a leading Scandinavian AI SaaS scaleup whilst contributing to a sustainable transformation of the customer service industry that are in the very forefront of the AI revolution?  

  

Join us as Senior Product Designer and help us shape the Kundo user experience across our Customer service platform. You will innovate new products, as well as identify and solve problems across our current product offering. You will be involved in the entire design process, from ideation to execution, and have a voice in all product decisions.  

  

We offer Sweden’s leading customer service system for all digital channels, enhanced with AI and automation to deliver fast and seamless support. Our all-in-one solution future-proofs your customer service by combining case management and self service – striking the perfect balance between assisted service and self service.
